description: Stores the treatment day audit trail information.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the action taken on the day.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Treatment Day Status Changed


Treatment Day Planned Date Changed


Treatment Day Given Externally Details Modified


Treatment Day Deferred Details Modified


Treatment Day Canceled Details Modified


Treatment Day Reactivated


Treatment Day Type Changed


Treatment Day Length Changed

columns.name: DAY_AUD_LINE_NUM
columns.description: Stores the line number of the day in the treatment plan.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the UTC instant at which the action was performed.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_OLD_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the old value for the action.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_NEW_VALUE
columns.description: Stores the new value for the action.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_COMMENT
columns.description: Stores the comment for performing the action.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_REASON
columns.description: Stores the reason for the performing the action.

columns.name: DAY_AUD_USR_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who performed the action.
